I found that this is wrong. Democracy actually is a powerful motivating force for a critical slice of the population *if they perceive a real threat*.

posts.text: > "I don't understand why people keep asking me questions that are clearly answered by my shirt that I've been wearing and gesturing violently at for months. The shirt has gotten rather gross and stinky but you people won't stop bringing this up so I can't exactly wear something else now can I."

I'm not as excited about this ruling as everyone else. On the one hand: yes, the tariffs were struck down. But the finding was just that IEEPA doesn't authorize tariffs.

SCOTUS did nothing to restrain POTUS from arbitrarily invoking emergency powers.

The shenanigans will continue.
